name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Beef Sliders
description: Three mini beef patties served on brioche buns with caramelized onions and cheddar cheese.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, eggs, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a sweet and tangy sauce.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil leaves drizzled with balsamic glaze and olive oil.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender beef strips in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy blend of spinach, artichoke hearts, and cheese, served with tortilla chips.
